channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Mellanox OS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- Mellanox OS

item.title: CVE-2024-0113|2024-08-13T14:15:20.160Z -- nvidia -- mellanox%20os
item.description: NVIDIA Mellanox OS, ONYX, Skyway, and MetroX-3 XCC contain a vulnerability in the web support, where an attacker can cause a CGI path traversal by a specially crafted URI. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to escalation of privileges and information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-0101|2024-08-08T18:12:46.321Z -- nvidia -- mellanox%20os
item.description: NVIDIA Mellanox OS, ONYX, Skyway, MetroX-2 and MetroX-3 XC contain a vulnerability in ipfilter, where improper ipfilter definitions could enable an attacker to cause a failure by attacking the switch. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0101|2024-08-08T17:11:07.194Z -- nvidia -- mellanox%20os
item.description: NVIDIA Mellanox OS, ONYX, Skyway, MetroX-2 and MetroX-3 XC contain a vulnerability in ipfilter, where improper ipfilter definitions could enable an attacker to cause a failure by attacking the switch. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-0104|2024-08-08T17:35:33.292Z -- nvidia -- mellanox%20os
item.description: NVIDIA Mellanox OS, ONYX, Skyway, MetroX-2 and MetroX-3 XC contain a vulnerability in the LDAP AAA component, where a user can cause improper access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to information disclosure, data tampering, and escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-0113|2024-08-09T02:19:30.529Z -- nvidia -- mellanox%20os
item.description: NVIDIA Mellanox OS, ONYX, Skyway, and MetroX-3 XCC contain a vulnerability in the web support, where an attacker can cause a CGI path traversal by a specially crafted URI. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to escalation of privileges and information disclosure.
